channel.title: jira.namics.com
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2716] Punch out products can be seen. An error occurs only they are added to cart
item.description:
Hi David!

Please see these 2 products:

http://test.distrelec.at/de/Toshiba-40RL938G---40%22-LCD-TV-mit-LED-Hintergrundbeleuchtung-Toshiba-40RL938G/p/11057778

http://test.distrelec.at/de/Toshiba-40RL938G---40%22-LCD-TV-mit-LED-Hintergrundbeleuchtung-Toshiba-40RL938G/p/11057778

Regards,
Oana
item.summary: Punch out products can be seen. An error occurs only they are added to cart

comments.comment:
I tested the punchout a few weeks back for CH and AT and it worked fine. But doesn't seem to work anymore:
- Pages are being displayed when accessed directly
- Pages can be accessed through search with article number

Yes they can, and that is as intended. Country-specific punchout products are not supposed to be hidden, but the "add to cart" function should be prevented (which it is).

The issue at hand here is a different one:
Are those two (random) products really supposed to have a punchout filter for AT, or do we have a data quality issue? It appears that a high number of products has a punchout filter defined, and I'm not sure if this is actually as intended. Can you please verify?

See also this report from business testers (Beat Eugster):

From: noreply@jotform.com [mailto:noreply@jotform.com]
Sent: Donnerstag, 16. Januar 2014 15:19
To: Ilie, Oana
Subject: New BUG from business testers
 
jotform.com
Question
Answer
Your Name Beat Eugster
Your E-Mail beat.eugster@distrelec.com
URL of the page where error was found; e.g. http://test.distrelec.at/ http://test.distrelec.at
Browser used to test Internet Explorer 8
Type of feedback Bugs
Description of the bug Products for nederlands ore ELFA are not allowed in Austria !
Print Screen 1 Dutch-Products.docx

Hallo Nando,

I strongly disagree and I'm pretty sure that it worked as I created a ticket regarding wrong concept in PIM related to suppress shop attribute.

Country-specific punchout products are supposed to be hidden,

It is normal that we have a lot of products suppressed as those IT products are usually a country version or we are not allowed to sell and publish it in the specific country.

Those 2 articles have suppressed value and it's correct.
I may have misunderstood this - Adrian, can you clarify?

Nando, could it be that Raphael created the script to remove the suppress on the test articles? ...and maybe too many other articles?

This would actually prove that it was working, as testers never had their articles to test as we need to keep them suppressed for the live environment.
Punch-out filters for 969716 and 969066 exists. However, we do not use any Movex information but "calc_suppress_lov" from PIM XML export.

Current Situation
- - - - - - - - - - - - -
The punch-out filters are defined fine on those products, the filters for them can be found in the HMC.

However it is a general fact that product with a country-based punchout filter are currently visible in the respective country. All a punchout filter does is prevent the product from being added to the cart in the respective country. This has never been different.

So there seems to have been a difference in understanding of what the country punchout filter actually does.


Possible Solution Approach
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
There is a FactFinder Index per Site and Language. A Site may have one (e.g. Austria) or multiple (e.g. Switzerland with Liechtenstein) delivery countries.

The FactFinder export could be altered, so that products which have a punchout filter defined for all delivery countries of a site are not exported to that site's index.
Products that have a punchout filter defined for FL but not for CH would be visible for all, but cannot be shipped to delivery addresses in FL

Impact needs to be assessed in detail, roughly 1d.

Hi Nando,

I'm suprised. It was always an issue that testers could not reach the test products due to the punchout filter defined. Raphael always had to remove them first.

But anyway, this definitely needs to get fixed. This is always a big legal issue.

You are right, the filters interfered with the testing, but it was actually the checkout scripts where they needed to add them to the cart but couldn't.
We will investigate and plan this in detail tomorrow.

I receive more and more products from business testers with the same issue:

test.distrelec.at/de/Flachkabel-4-adrig-beige-30-m-Maxxtro-TC-204-100/p/15550073?mainId=11051728


When will this be fixed?

Hi Oana,

according to Cornel, this should be ready for the next deployment by end of this week.

We discussed the logic with Adrian tonight, described in the last comment in DISTRELEC-2010
https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2010?focusedCommentId=526872&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-526872

FactFinder export has been adjusted.

As expected the performance of the Export has decreased:

DEV channel ch_de:
* WITHOUT punch out filters: ~ 7 min.
* WITH punch out filters: ~ 24 min.

DEV channel ch_en:
* WITHOUT punch out filters: ~ 6 min.
* WITH punch out filters: ~ 16 min.

DEV channel at_de:
* WITHOUT punch out filters: ~ 7 min.
* WITH punch out filters: ~ 16 min.

DEV channel at_en:
* WITHOUT punch out filters: ~ 6 min.
* WITH punch out filters: ~ 16 min.
If user tries to access a product, for which a punchout is defined, he will get the 404 page.

In total +2.0PD
item.summary: Sorting of WebUse A, B and C facets: Meetings and technical concept.

comments.comment:
Hi Cornel,

please do also track progress to the change within this issue. Change status to "Testing", when done.
David, please can you speed this up.

Raphael will send an overview of the call from today with FF incl. next steps and due dates. FF confirmed that they would be able to develop for us until end of the week as long as we can deliver the exports on time (tomorrow). Cornel will finalize the definition and align with FF so they can start with the development tomorrow.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-818] G101 Backoffice user and permission management and right matrix (BO-4) BE
item.summary: G101 Backoffice user and permission management and right matrix (BO-4) BE

comments.comment:
I used the following FlexibleSearch Statement to extract Types/Attributes that have been modified by one of our distrelec... or namics... extensions:

{code}
SELECT
    {ct.code},{ad.qualifier}
FROM
    {ComposedType AS ct
JOIN AttributeDescriptor AS ad ON {ct.pk}={ad.enclosingType}}
WHERE
    {ct.pk} IN
({{
        SELECT
{ad.enclosingType}
        FROM
{AttributeDescriptor AS ad}
        WHERE
({ad.extensionName} LIKE 'distrelec%' OR {ad.extensionName} LIKE 'nam%')
AND superattributedescriptorpk is null
        }})
OR ({ct.extensionName} LIKE 'distrelec%' OR {ct.extensionName} LIKE 'nam%')
ORDER BY LOWER({ct.code}),LOWER({ad.qualifier})
{code}

As discussed with Raphael Husi:

- Namics will provide the basic permission matrix with all relevant types and attributes. Main and obvious permissions are already set by Namics.
- Namics will hand over the permission matrix to Raphael Husi
- Raphael Husi as owner of the permissions in hybris at Distrelec will apply the permission matrix by himself and will define the and adapt details.

Therefore, can you Adrian please give Raphael Husi the created permission matrix and resolve the regarding subtask.

Thank you.

Done.

I have looked with Raphael to set the good rights (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for the good groups (noaccessgroup, distDefaultGroup, distContentManagerGroup, distProductManagerGroup, distCallcenterUserGroup, distAdminGroup).
If a subType has the same rights than the superType, we will not redefine it (the subType will inherit the superType's rights).

In the Bemerkung column, I have added the name of the superType. Only the attributes of the type are listed for the type (and not the attribute from the superType)
Regarding Laurent the permissions are set. Please put an eye on the permissions during next test cycle.
Update done with the last changes the 22.01

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2812] New Content Form: Catalog Order Form
item.description:
A new content form page is needed, with a form for the user to order the catalog (physical book of 2600 pages).

Form Fields

  • ‚Verfügbare Kataloge‘ - 2 Checkboxes, validation upon send: at least one must be selected!
    — 'DISTRELEC (Industrie Elektronik - Automation - Messtechnik)'
    — 'IT & Zubehör (Computertechnik)'
  • Firmenname (input field)
  • Firmenname 2 (input field)
  • Anrede * (dropdown, same as in registration forms)
  • Vorname * (input field)
  • Nachname * (input field)
  • Abteilung (input field)
  • Strassenname * (input field)
  • Hausnummer (input field)
  • Postfach (input field)
  • Postleitzahl * (input field)
  • Ort * (input field)
  • Land * (Dropdown, only Österreich available and pre-selected; as in the registration form)
  • Telefonnummer (input field)
  • Mobiltelefonnummer (input field)
  • Faxnummer (input field)
  • E-Mail Adresse * (input field)
  • Kommentar (multi-line input field)
  • Captcha

Behavior upon send

  • Fields marked with * are mandatory; at least one catalog checkbox must be selected
  • The content of the form should be sent to a Distrelec-internal email address (same principle as with the address change form per DISTRELEC-2078)
    • email address definable per country (for AT: 'info-at@distrelec.com')
  • A "thank you" page should appear when the form was sent successfully, instead of just the global message on the same page. (in case of an error: red global message on form page)
item.summary: New Content Form: Catalog Order Form

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2818] Share cart via e-mail: no prices in received e-mail
item.description:
OS: Windows 7 Professional
Browser: IE 8.0.7601.17514
TS-27.14

Add some products to cart, click on share icon, select the function "share via e-mail", fill out the appearing form, in received e-mail the prices are set to 0.00. Also the downloadable csv file contains no content. (img321-324_pzu)
item.summary: Share cart via e-mail: no prices in received e-mail

comments.comment: Also, the email should contain the full list of products that are in the cart, not just the summary.
Temporary error, sometimes this function works, sometimes not.
Rene, Lukas denkt, dass der nix mit dem Email template zu tun hat. Kannst du mal versuchen zu reproduzieren und dann an die richtige Person weitergeben?

Looks like a session issue. See DISTRELEC-2756 for details.

I could reproduce this behaviour when deleting my cookie (which is the same like loosing a session). See print screen: DISTRELEC-2756

Please retest when the issue: DISTRELEC-2756 (Session time-out after only a few minutes) is closed.
(HP has fixed the session problem today. Testing is in progress right now.)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2811] OCI: Login Access Denied
item.description:
I'm trying to login with:
https://test.distrelec.ch/ociEntry?username=distrelec.testing+oci@gmail.com&password=123456&hook_url=http://q08.elfa.se:50000/elfa3/catalogdb/DisplayParametersServlet&oci_version=4.0

Result: HTTP Status 403 - Access Denied.
item.summary: OCI: Login Access Denied

comments.comment: As already discussed with Florian and Nando, this error occurs because of the '+' symbol in the username.

The Credentials we get have to be URL encoded. The plus sign is a reserved character which needs to be replaced by '%2b'. In the wikipedia entry below, you'll find which characters are reserved and with which percent-encoding it has to be replaced.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Percent-encoding

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2802] Hero Teaser: text and price not visible in chrome 21
item.description:
Chrome 21.0.1180.89 m auf Windows 7

In the hero teaser, the title and price are not visible on the teaser elements.
(Those texts work fine on the carpet.)
item.summary: Hero Teaser: text and price not visible in chrome 21

comments.comment:
The current version of Google Chrome is 33. We were able to get an old Google Chrome Version 22 and tried to reproduce the issue. It looks like it is an issue only on Google Chrome 21 or maybe the issues is caused by a Browser Extension oder something like that.

May we close this issue, because it seems to be an edge case? If not, we would need access to a Laptop with a Google Chrome Version 21.

I agree, it is an edge case. An alternative Browser is available on the tester's machines.
Thanks for trying.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2800] Default Settings (payment, delivery): for new users, settings wrongly show as selected
item.description:
• create a completely new user.
  • new users who haven't placed an order yet don't have saved default settings for payment options and delivery methods.
  • go to my account, open the settings page: invoice and standard delivery show as selected

=> Instead, none of the radio buttons should be selected if there actually is no selection saved to the user.
item.summary: Default Settings (payment, delivery): for new users, settings wrongly show as selected

comments.comment: Assuming this is only an FE problem?

This is a Backend only issue.

The variables ${shippingOption.defaultDeliveryMode} and
${paymentOption.defaultPaymentMode} return true, even if the account is newly registered, see Screenshot.

The Frontend uses them in the following to files:
checkout-delivery-options-list-myaccount.jsp
checkout-payment-options-list-myaccount.jsp
As discussed, the settings will be preselected if an order has been purchased.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2796] Carpet: New Custom Teaser Variants (full-size images)
item.description:
Context

  • The carpet was expanded by an option for a custom teaser with texts and a standard-size image: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2173
  • It became clear that the marketing department also needs to be able to place full-size images in both the square and the portrait tiles that contain all the texts. Therefore, an additional custom teaser variant is needed.

Requirements

  • Additional variant of the custom carpet tile, selectable in the CMS cockpit
  • Contains a full size image
  • Does not contain any texts (no title, main text, subtext)
  • Image sizes
    • Square: 319x319 for left and right column, and 318x319 for middle column
    • Portrait: 319x639 for left and right column, and 318x639 for middle column
  • The image sizes provided by the author must exactly match the required size to avoid distortion. The image provided must not have a any border, as that is part of the front end.
  • Ideally, the image size is validated by the CMS cockpit, if possible

To be clarified with FE whether the difference of 1 Pixel for the middle column can be handled in the FE, or whether the author needs to provide a different image size for the middle column.

After the change, the user can chose any combination of the following options to fill the rotating teaser:

  • carpet automatically fed by fact finder
  • carpet manually filled, with either
    • a product
    • a custom teaser with text, smaller image
    • a customer teaser without texts an full-size image (new)
item.summary: Carpet: New Custom Teaser Variants (full-size images)

comments.comment: Please assign to Jan after BE Work is done.
Can you please adjust the frontend. There is an attribute called fullsize on the teaser data, which gives you the information if it s a full-size teaser or not.
frontend is adjusted

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2795] Rotating Teaser: New Custom Teaser Variant (full-size image)
item.description:
Context

  • The rotating teaser was expanded by an option for a custom teaser with texts and a standard-size image: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2174
  • It became clear that the marketing department also needs to be able to place full-size images that contain all the texts. Therefore, an additional custom teaser variant is needed.

Requirements

  • Additional variant of a hero teaser tile, selectable in the CMS cockpit
  • Contains a full size image
  • Does not contain any texts (no title, main text, subtext)
  • Image sizes
    • 100% Teaser: 370x960
    • 66% Teaser: 370x640
  • The image sizes provided by the author must exactly match the required size to avoid distortion. The image provided must not have a top and lower border, as that is part of the front end. The image size of the thumbnail needs to be 82 x 68.
  • Ideally, the image size is validated by the CMS cockpit, if possible

After the change, the user can chose any combination of the following options to fill the rotating teaser:

  • manually selected product
  • manually selected category
  • manually selected manufacturer

New Fullsize Images need to be 960x370 (100% width) and 640x370 (66% width)

  • custom teaser with text, smaller image
  • custom teaser without text, full-size image (new)
item.summary: Rotating Teaser: New Custom Teaser Variant (full-size image)

comments.comment: See attached screenshot for a MOCKUP of the expected result.
Please assign to Jan after BE Work is done.

Hi Laurent,

For implementing the frontend, I need to know somehow, what type of image is coming (custom fullsize or standard fullsize) Please add this flag either on the teaserItemData Object or on the thumbnail object
Can you please adjust the frontend. There is an attribute called fullsize on the teaser data, which gives you the information if it s a full-size teaser or not.
frontend is adjusted

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2792] Invoiced total not correct during Warenkorb process - Bestelldetails form - order confirmation
item.description:
No script. Total is not correct. Already during purchasing process on stage 2 teh total si not correct. 47.20 + 3.78 <> 51.00. Doc named "Einkauf Ablauf Stufe 2".
Look at other attached docs.
Sum-up :
Zwischensumme : 47.20
Versand : 12.40
Steuern : 4.77
Gesamt : 64.35
47.20 + 12.40 + 4.7 ====> 64.37
item.summary: Invoiced total not correct during Warenkorb process - Bestelldetails form - order confirmation

comments.comment:
Raphael,
I understood you are already working on this?

The calculation is absolutely correct. The total gets rounded mathematical and in CH also a commercial rounding is done as we just have 5 cents as smallest coins.
So in the first screenshots: 47.20 + 12.40 + 4.77 = 64.37 --> rounded 64.35
In the last screenshot: 47.20 + 3.78 = 50.98 --> rounded 51.00

The commercial rounding was done for all currencies, that will be fixed with the next deployment, so that uit just will be done for CHF.

attachment.name: Einkauf Ablauf - Stufe 2 - total not ok.png
attachment.author: jlebec

attachment.name: Einkauf Ablauf - Stufe 3 - total not ok.png
attachment.author: jlebec

attachment.name: Ihr Einkaufskorb - total not correct 47.20 plus 3.78 equal 49.98 not 51.png
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2791] Remove prefix from facets in all languages "shop by" / "Einkaufen nach"
item.description: Please remove the prefix.
item.summary: Remove prefix from facets in all languages "shop by" / "Einkaufen nach"

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2790] Facets - Sorting Availability/Price not consistent
item.description:
• The configuration was done in FF backend, to display Availability and then Price at the end (after all technical attributes). See printscreen "FF_Config_Price_Availability_ASN_Configuration.jpg".
  • Doing an initial search, it works, facets fist shows category filter, then availability and price ((FF_Config_Price_Availability_Original_Search_OK.jpg")
  • But as soon as we go in the filtering of category and actually get the facet with technical attributes, the attributes Price and Availability appear (without apparent logic).
  • If there is a logic, could we influence it?
  • Could it be fixed by FF?
item.summary: Facets - Sorting Availability/Price not consistent

comments.comment: FF will fixed that with the next customization. So for the deployment f tomorrow or Friday it should be ready and fixed.
Now it works. You can test it directly as this change is not deployment depending.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2789] Commercial rounding is just allowed for CH
item.description: The commercial rounding is just allowed for CH. All other countries should round mathematically to the next cent.
item.summary: Commercial rounding is just allowed for CH

comments.comment:
I added a new attribute to the currency type named roundCommercial of type boolean.
So for each currency can be defined if a commercial rounding should be done.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2786] Error during import of product features of type isodate or isodatetime
item.description:
All attributes of BaseType "isodate" and "isodatetime" have not been imported. The following error has been written to the pim_import.log file:

Could not initialize ClassAttributeAssignment with basic properties: Could not determine attribute type for code [isodate] within classification class [class-root]
item.summary: Error during import of product features of type isodate or isodatetime

comments.comment:
This bugfix would require to clear all product hash values. However, since David is modifying the XML content, the hashes will change anyhow. And the attributes, that have not been imported, are non-critical.

I will check the pim_import.log file after the first PIM import based on the v0.5.12. The error mentioned above must not occur anymore.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2777] My Account: Email address entry required for non-migrated users
item.description:
• go to my account with a non-migrated user
  • open "login data"
  • in the first section ("Ihr Konto") edit one of the fields
  • NOTE THAT no email address field is visible
  • click "ändern"
  • an error is returned, an new email address field appears.

Also see screencapture.

This field is only mandatory (and visible by default) for migrated users of whom no email address is available yet.

For non-migrated users this is not necessary as their login name is the email address.
item.summary: My Account: Email address entry required for non-migrated users

comments.comment: Fixed by setting the correct URL in the jsp-file.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2760] Copyright Statement on each page
item.description:
Please disable the link at the footer of each page, from © Distrelec word.

please replace © Distrelec word with:

© 2014 Distrelec Gesellschaft m. b. H. Alle Rechte vorbehalten.
item.summary: Copyright Statement on each page

comments.comment:
The footer contents currently are stored in properties (footer.copyright.url and footer.copyright.label).

We can adapt the contents of those properties, however please note that those values are language-specific, but not country-specific.

Oana,

I would be glad about a short confirmation that it is okay with you that Copyright information is language-specific, but not country-specific. Otherwise please let me know asap.

Thanks!

This is bad then. We will always have there the name of the legal entity, that is pecific per country.

If we are to go for plan B, a copyright page, what can we publish there?

From: Matthias Fehske (JIRA) [mailto:AutoMailer@namics.com]
Sent: Dienstag, 21. Januar 2014 10:49
To: Ilie, Oana
Subject: [jira.namics] (DISTRELEC-2760) Copyright Statement on each page

[https://jira.namics.com/s/en_US-j34b09/731/82/_/jira-logo-scaled.png]

[https://jira.namics.com/secure/useravatar?ownerId=mfehske&avatarId=12147]Matthias Fehske<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ViewProfile.jspa?name=mfehske> commented on [Task] DISTRELEC-2760<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2760>
Copyright Statement on each page<https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2760>



The footer contents currently are stored in properties (footer.copyright.url and footer.copyright.label).

We can adapt the contents of those properties, however please note that those values are language-specific, but not country-specific.




This message is automatically generated by JIRA.
If you think it was sent incorrectly, please contact your JIRA administrators<https://jira.namics.com/secure/ContactAdministrators!default.jspa>.
For more information on JIRA, see: http://www.atlassian.com/software/jira

The properties need to be changed, this needs to be country- and language-specific. Created a ticket: DISTRELEC-2806

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2758] Search field wrong upon browser zoom
item.description:
when zooming out or in, the main search field is distorted to two lines.

At least in chrome, possibly also other browsers.
item.summary: Search field wrong upon browser zoom

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2756] Session time-out after only a few minutes
item.description:
The session times out very quickly, after around 5 minutes of inactivity.

This happens even though the session time-out has been increased to 4 hours: DISTRELEC-2523

The current hypothesis is that there is a problem with the load balancer losing the sticky session.
item.summary: Session time-out after only a few minutes

comments.comment: Furthermore, the "login speichern" seems to have no effect.

Issue is addressed with HP:

Hello Rene,
 
I will consult a little with Marek what can cause this issue. We will first have a look on the wireshark because the cookie tracking doesn’t really have a lifetime, in fact the load-balancer remembers the cookies during the whole “HTTP session” until this session lasts (not TCP session), there is only a clean-up timer which is much bigger than 10minutes. Will contact you for details once we go through the packet dumps.

From my side the only question right now is the impact of this problem. Because right now we are replacing the load-balancers with a new pair and would like to know if this issue can maybe wait to be solved after the migration (currently Wednesday/Thursday expected) so that we do not have to solve it twice. Will this be OK with you? Or maybe Daniel can comment on this.
 
Best regards, mit freundlichen Grüßen
Peter

HP has fixed the session problem today.
Testing is in progress right now.

Hello Peter

I did some tests yesterday, and the sticky session worked fine.
I also have a confirmation from one of your consultants, that it looks good now.

Could you please increate the timeout to 4 hours,
so it is the same as we have configured.

Thanks René
I will wait for HP to confirm, that they changed the timeout to 4h.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2754] Suggest Layer: Results of category and manufacturer not clickable
item.description:
• search e.g. for "usb"
  • in the manufacturer and category tab, the 5 results are not clickable, nothing happens.
item.summary: Suggest Layer: Results of category and manufacturer not clickable

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2753] Findings after deployment of the new FF customizations
item.description:
There are some findings after the deployment of the new FF customizations. The get consolidated in this ticket.

1. (DISTRELEC-2759) The facets name and value has to be handled separately. So the facet label has to be used for displaying the facet value. The facet value has to be used for the search request.

2. It seems that facets are still show, but the have no effect to the filtering, because all available products in the search result have the same value for this facet. So we expect that this facet should not appear any more.

3. The selected filters do not contain a label and the value separately. So we just get the value. So if you select 1 kOhm the selected facet is named 1000 Ohm. We check if we can have there also the separation, if not we have to take the selected facets out of all the available facets. We think we have to ho the second way as the other change will be a change on the WSDL, we expect.
item.summary: Findings after deployment of the new FF customizations

comments.comment:
2. fixed by the new customization
3. @Cornel: FF told me that we can use the breadcrumb to get the select facets and there it will also be possible to bring in some customizations. The other solution is the one we discussed, to loop over all facets and take the selected elements. What do you prefer?
All bugs are fixed with the new customization we got today
Raphael, please resolve this ticket if there aren't any FactFinder related issues anymore.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2751] Header menus in French with user in German
item.description:
No testing script attached.
Navigation menus are in French with a German user.
Country is CH.
item.summary: Header menus in French with user in German

comments.comment: languag doesn't actually change after the language switch in the settings lightbox. only after the session times out, it switches.
it's a caching problem. not relevant for AT because they have only one language.

attachment.name: Header menus in french - user in german.png
attachment.author: jlebec

attachment.name: Menus in French - user in german.png
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2750] Prices in search and on product form are not the same
item.description:
No script attached. Florian is informed.
Price in search is not equal to the one at product level. See the 2 screenshots.

Same issue with
no user FR and B2C
no user GER and B2C
user jwlb29@gmail.com FR and B2C
user jwlb29@gmail.com GER and B2C
item.summary: Prices in search and on product form are not the same

comments.comment:
Indeed for this product the pricer is different.
For others it seems to be ok.

Please also see DISTRELEC-2752
Issue seems to be there when the price is lower than 1.-

Hi Cornel

As discussed: The problem I think is just that we do not take care about the Unit Factor. So we have to modify the export for FF, so that the price gets divided by the unit factor. Normally, that will be a division by 1.

2 Issues have been fixed:
* Unit factor was not used in FF-Export
* Pattern to parse a price of a Product-Suggestion was not tolerant enough

attachment.name: price at product level - Hybris source.png
attachment.author: jlebec

attachment.name: price in Search - Fact Finder source.png
attachment.author: jlebec

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2746] default settings in my account - delivery and payment
item.description:
I put two default settings in my account settings about delivery and payment. Those two are not activated when I check out. For me it would make sense that these are the standard settings. Otherwise I don't see the need/use to define "default settings".

Bug from Daniela Truttmann
item.summary: default settings in my account - delivery and payment

comments.comment:
Oana,
I tested it with distrelec.testing+17, and distrelec.testing+17-1, it worked in both cases.
Can you find out which user was used in the test?
Thanks
daniela.truttmann@distrelec.com

Tested it again, with
nando.mueller@gmail.com / distrelec

At first nothing was pre-selected. Completed one order, ordered again, still nothing preselected.

Then opened the settings in my account, didn't save the page, ordered again, nothing selected.

Logged out, logged in, to checkout again, now the settings were selected.
As far as I can see, the settings are never preselected, until you explicitly save the changes under settings in myaccount. After that it will be preselected.

Dishan, I have observed the following:
- Add item to cart
- go to Einstellungen
- Change payment method and save
- go to checkout
- payment method is wrong (still the old one)
- submit the order
- create new order and go to checkout
- now it has taken over the changed settings

tested again. The issue is:
When you open the settings for a registered user and edit e.g. the default payment method, and then save the form, these changes don't take effect. Apparently they do get saved after an order as patrick found out.
Has been fied with this ticket DISTRELEC-2800

comments.comment: Apparently still not fixed, should have been addressed by DISTRELEC-2690
Functionality appears for B2B users who have the permission (correct), but not for B2B admins (incorrect)
The reason is, that all registered admins do not have the corresponding permission. So I have to add the permission to all the admins and im not sure if I can do that, so I have to analyse that.
I have implemented a little bash script to fix that. On the Q system all B2B admins should not have the permission for quotation.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2672] Email/Printout problems after ordering
item.description:
TS 31 - After having ordered an item with distrelec.testing+15@gmail.com, I checked the conformation email, various things are missing or are wrong. See printscreen 2.

Additionally when I click on "Details zu Ihrer Bestellung" this opens the order deatils and also here Invoive and shipping details are missing. See printscreen 3
item.summary: Email/Printout problems after ordering

comments.comment: The missing images are the same issue with the gmail web interface as here: DISTRELEC-2662

Lukas,
can you complete the open todos or do you still need some input?

Hi Nando

Additional to the missing image problem you commented above, there are several issues on this ticket:

- since the addresses are missing on checkout pages too, this is not an email related problem
- mssing contact email address is provided here: https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2662
- I need to know if the "ERP Bestell-ID" and the "Voraussichtliches Lieferdatum" properties are available now, otherwise i will delete them from the email template for now.

Checked with Adi and Florian:
- "Voraussichtliches Lieferdatum": not available with movex. You can remove this.
- "ERP Bestell-ID": The label should actually be "Auftragsbestätigungsnummer", the number showing should be the hybris-generated order ID
Lukas, please reassign to me after the template issue is fixed, I'll follow up on the missing address.
There is already an order code property -> removed erp order code from template

René,
the order 00000MK0 has no addresses. Do you have any idea how this got to be?
Thanks

no shipping address -> delivery mode = pickup
no payment address -> payment mode = credit card

I see the first point: no shipping address -> delivery mode = pickup
=> There cannot be a shipping address if in-store pick up was selected. We will have to remove it from this page and the email for this case.
=> Created separate ticket for this, as this is less critical: DISTRELEC-2734

I don't see the second point.
=> There always has to be a payment/invoice address, it is always selected and needs to be part of the order, regardless of how the user pays and what the delivery/pickup mode is.

René,
the hypothesis is that if a customer selects "in-store pick-up" in combination with credit card payment, no payment/invoice address is added to the order.
However the invoice address should always be there, as it is always given or selected by the customer.

Can you please
- verify if this is the only case where the invoice address goes missing
- fix it : )
Thanks

I cannot confirm you hypothesis.

Please see my print screen: 2014-01-20_1415.png

I did an order with a B2B user, Pick-Up and Creditcard, and the billing address was not lost.

Issue with missing Billing-Address is fixed already:

DISTRELEC-2619 / Billing Address not saved when using CreditCard
After retesting today I had to reopen ticket as the logos do not appear correctly. see printscreen 4
Did you consider the first comment of this ticket? (issue with gmail web client --> https://jira.namics.com/browse/DISTRELEC-2662 )
Stephan, as discussed: the images don't work in the test environment because the test environment is password protected. They will work in the prod environment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2664] Set initial password page: button too small
item.description: The "passwort aktualisieren" button on the "set initial password" page for sub-users is not wide enough.
item.summary: Set initial password page: button too small

comments.comment: fixed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2635] Prevent simultan calls to cart/update on cart Page
item.description:
Currently as of 14.01.2014, every time the user clicks on the +/- button on the cart page, an ajax request is sent to the backend. Problem of that behaviour is, that one call could take longer than the next one and so on the backend, the quantity in the backend is not the same anymore, as it is presented in the frontend.

Check with backend if it would be possible to just abort earlier calls as soon as the next one is getting sent?

If it would be ok, abort calls as it is done in typeahead...
item.summary: Prevent simultan calls to cart/update on cart Page

comments.comment: As soon as the call arrived at the backend, it is too late to stop it. For now we keep it like that

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2631] FactFinder App: Service Failed
item.description:
FF-App Service ist trotz Upgrade auf 20GB, gestoppt. Auf datblbk04001x ist der Service gestoppt, hingegen auf datblbk04002x läuft es.
Was ist der Grund, dass der datblbk04001x gestoppt hat? Reconfig nötig?
item.summary: FactFinder App: Service Failed

comments.comment:
Hi Raphael

Can you please check that with Omikron?

Thanks
René

We did some optimizations on the FF servers. The last night the servers have not crashed. I close the ticket, but keep an eye on that. if it happens again, I'll reopen the ticket and we discuss again the topic with FF.

comments.comment: demoted bug because no functionality is limited. "Only" an usability bug, which will be solved for IT/CH.
Done!

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2544] FE Newsletter Registration Form: distance between checkbox and line/buttons

please increase the distance between last checkbox and the line above the submit button.

looks good : )

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2530] Cart: Handling of errors in direct order
item.description:
When the user adds an invalid term in the direct order field and hits enter or clicks "add to cart", nothing happens. No product is added to the cart, of course, but the user in not informed about the error.

Please add an error message in the form of a red layer above the field (same as on the number field if there is a min order quantity error) with a message "A product with this Type or Article Number could not be found". Message should disapper after a few seconds (same as for number field).
item.summary: Cart: Handling of errors in direct order

comments.comment: Nando, why is this phase 2?

Hi Dishan

Before you start with this change request please make the needed adaptions of your work station to work on the correct svn branche. A written manual will be provided by Adrian within the next few days.

Discussed with Florian:

As the behavior of the direct order on "enter" is now different (the field doesn't get emptied, also if no product could be found for the term entered), the error message as described above should be implemented.

Should get into the AT release.
Please assign to Jan after backend work is done.
BE done
FE done. Added a popover, see printscreen
what should happen with the error popover? Which user interaction should make it disappear again? Should it be timebased with a timeout?
timebased with same timeout as on the field for the number of products
added timeout

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2374] Order confirmation mail HTML Mail looks strange
item.description:
Have a look at the screenshot.
There's a empty line between Distrelec 10 and Peter Muster

Think that's not correct

Order made with customer 17-1
Win7/Chrome 31
Order number: 00000FIT
item.summary: Order confirmation mail HTML Mail looks strange

comments.comment: see also template attached here: DISTRELEC-1103
can you please check why this empty line is there
the issue appeared on the confirmation mail, not on the pdf. However, there were some updates on the mail templates in the meantime, it looks like the problem has been solved.
the problem is not solved...

Mark,
I'm sorry this fix will only take effect after the next deployment (scheduled for thursday night).
The fix version got lost, I added it now. Please retest in the next cycle.
If the problem remains, please check on the hmc if your delivery address contains some strange characters. With my customer data, I don't get the problem, see screenshot.

Sorry but still the same...
If I order with customer 17 and take the billing address 5 and the shipping address 10 the empty line still exists

Lukas,
can you please check this for the mentioned customer 17?
Thanks

Hi Raphi,

according to Lukas, this is probably a data problem, or a problem with the import of the test user. This seems to be the only address, which is displayed with a break.

Can you please check the imported adress, or test it within the mail account. We do not have access to the inbox of this customer.

Or can Nabil, or Laurent take care of this?

According to Lukas, the mail template and logic is correct.

Thank you!

Hi Dean

This user has been created manually during the testing as it is a sub user of the distrelec.testing+17@gmail.com.
So the issue is not in the sample data.
Unfortunately, I have checked the address in the hMC and with a direct sql query, but I can also not see if there is a line break.
The question is: Should we do a data cleansing before we save the entered data?

Hi Lukas,

can you please take care of this ticket again. Adrian suggest to analyze the error from the e-mail.

Please ask Nando if he has the credentials to get the e-mail, or contact Mark and aks him, if he can deliver you the original email with the html source code.

- Is there a "(br)"- tag or similiar in the e-mail html?
- Is the value of the address already with the break-space?
- Check the address in the order in the hmc (order # 00000ITM). Is there the space? Or check in on a database level.

If the address was created with the break space, yuo can resolve this ticket.

Thank you.

No layout issue appears when opening email with order code 00000ITM on outlook (see screenshot). This seems to be a problem of the gmail webclient that sometimes inserts some undesired divs to the html.
-> Since we have no control over the html rendering of web mail clients, this ticket can be closed.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-2787] Product Finder / Fact Finder: Feature Values are not being supplied for certain category
item.description:
Created a product finder for category cat-15499 (Kleinsignaldioden).

Product feature values such as "Durchlassstrom" and "Sperrspannung" are not being supplied by Fact Finder. After deleting the redirection to the Product Finder template, those features are not being displayed in the facet bar:

http://test.distrelec.at/de/Komponenten/Aktive-Bauelemente/Diskrete-Halbleiter-R%C3%B6hren/Dioden/Kleinsignaldioden/c/cat-15499
item.summary: Product Finder / Fact Finder: Feature Values are not being supplied for certain category

comments.comment:
When you follow the link in the description the WebUse facets are not displayed. But if you remove the Category filter by clicking the appropriate filter badge and then go back to the "Kleinsignaldioden" category by clicking the category filter again, the WebUse facets are displayed.

Raphael, I think we discussed the same problem yesterday in another context.

The attributes are exported as specified:

distrelec_7320_at_de_export_attributes:
"Komponenten/Aktive%20Bauelemente/Diskrete%20Halbleiter%20%2F%20R%C3%B6hren/Dioden/Kleinsignaldioden";"Sperrspannung|Durchlassstrom|Erholzeit|Gehäusetyp|Betriebstemperatur|Durchlassspannung"
There was a bug in the customization from FF. This should get fixed with the new one. This will be deployed with the deployment of tomorrow or Friday.
Issue is fixed with the newest customization. You can directly test it as this change is not deployment depending.

Raphael,

3 of 5 attributes are now available in the facet bar. However, "Durchlassstrom" and "Sperrspannung", the two attributes which have been configured for the Product Finder, are not being displayed.

Why is this? What is the difference between the 3 displayed attributes and the other 2?

(see screenshots)

item.title: [DISTRELEC-1830] Cleanup of already imported files
item.description: Handling of already imported files (archived files should be zipped, deleted after x days)
item.summary: Cleanup of already imported files

comments.comment:
Hi Raphi,

this point appears as we brainstormed what tasks need to done for live going. We either need information what settings are wanted, or you are going to configure this by yourself anyway.

Gruess d

Hi!

These imported files should be handled in hybris the same way they are handled today in the ishop:

- PIM is overwritten,
- Movex is kept one week;

This is confirmed with Florian.

Regards,
Rene, please can you take care of this? If anything is unclear, please check with Raphael.

: Hotfolder:
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp_movex_ascii\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\erp_movex_utf8\archive
hybris\data\acceleratorservices\import\distrelec\pim\archive

BE done. @Raphi, please create the configuration for each environment with the hotfolder location, with following keys:

file.cleanup.erp.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.ascii.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_ascii/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.utf8.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_utf8/archive
file.cleanup.pim.import=C:/project_distrelec/env/trunk/hybris/data/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/pim/import/archive

Hi Dishan

The paths are the same for all environments. I added the config to environment/common/hybris/conf/local.properties as following:

#-------------------------------------------------------------------
# Hotfolder cleanup
#-------------------------------------------------------------------
file.cleanup.erp.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.ascii.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_ascii/archive
file.cleanup.erp.mvx.utf8.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/erp_movex_utf8/archive
file.cleanup.pim.import=${HYBRIS_DATA_DIR}/acceleratorservices/import/distrelec/pim/archive
I disabled zipping of PIM-files. As discussed I'm assigning you the ticket to setup a unix cronjob which does the zipping.
